{"id":724257346,"lang":"python3","time":"2 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1655450529,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"217 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/724257346/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"17.7 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    dx = [-1, 0, 1, 0]\n    dy = [0, 1, 0, -1]\n    def dfs(self, grid, x, y, island):\n        self.avail[x][y] = False\n        island.append((x, y))\n        for i in range(4):\n            new_x = x + self.dx[i]\n            new_y = y + self.dy[i]\n            if (new_x < 0) or (new_x == self.n) or (new_y < 0) or (new_y == self.m):\n                continue\n            if (self.avail[new_x][new_y] is True) and (grid[new_x][new_y] == 1):\n                self.dfs(grid, new_x, new_y, island)\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        self.n = len(grid)\n        self.m = len(grid[0])\n        self.avail = [[True for _ in range(self.m)] for _ in range(self.n)]\n        res = 0\n        for i in range(self.n):\n            for j in range(self.m):\n                if (self.avail[i][j] is True) and (grid[i][j] == 1):\n                    island = []\n                    self.dfs(grid, i, j, island)\n                    res = max(res, len(island))\n        return res","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
